attributes.action: Make it mandatory to ask what is the definition of consent before entering clubs
attributes.additional_details: To be able to stop and prevent sexual assault, rape or any other unwanted sexual acts against the public, the knowledge of consent should be present. Being able to put a stop towards harassment and assault, we need to understand as a nation that we know what consent is.
attributes.background: I want the government to pass a bill making it illegal to enter a club if you can not explain what consent is at the door.

rejection.details:
Your petition calls for it to be made illegal to enter a club if you can not explain what consent is, but it's not clear what explanation you want guests to be required to give in order to be able to enter a club.

In any case, it is up to individual hospitality venues, not the Government what to ask guests on entry.
